categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, a battle took place on the planet Begeren.
The battle of Begeren took place sometime between the Battle of Toprawa and the Battle of Yavin, during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire.
The battle resulted in a victory for the Rebel Alliance.
News of the Rebel Alliance victory spread as far as Klatooine, giving hope to the native Klatooinians that they, too, might achieve freedom from their Hutt oppressors.
